tool_description: Manages course enrollment capacity, tracks current enrollment levels, and provides availability status for student registration systems.

maximum_capacity.description: Maximum enrollment capacity for the course

error_messages: Course not found: The specified course_id does not exist.
Invalid capacity: maximum_capacity must be a positive integer greater than 0.
Enrollment exceeds capacity: current_enrollment cannot exceed maximum_capacity.
Invalid waitlist capacity: waitlist_capacity must be a non-negative integer.
usage: Provide course_id and maximum_capacity as required parameters. Optionally specify current_enrollment and waitlist_capacity to track and manage course availability.

availability_status.description: Current availability status (open, full, waitlist_available, closed)

enrollment_percentage.description: Current enrollment as percentage of maximum capacity
